class LaundryTaskPlan(Document):
    def on_submit(self):
        # Call the function to create Daily Task Schedules
        self.create_daily_task_schedules()

    def create_daily_task_schedules(self):
        # Iterate through the child table entries
        for task in self.laundry_task_plan_detail:
            # Create a new Daily Task Schedule for each task
            daily_task_schedule = frappe.get_doc({
                "doctype": "Daily Task Schedule",
                "employee": task.employee,
                "task_name": task.task_name,
                "task_type": task.task_type,
                "item": task.item,
                "qty": task.qty,
                "date": self.posting_date,  # Use the posting date from the parent
                "supervisor": self.supervisor_name,
                "related_request_id": self.related_request_id
            })
            # Save the new document
            daily_task_schedule.insert()
            frappe.db.commit()  # Commit changes to the database
